alert.note: Alert for Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:42AM CDT until May 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Wilson and Bexar Counties. Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. Medina River At Hwy 281 affecting Bexar County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River near Floresville. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Secondary roads near the floodplain may become flooded and impassable. Extensive flooding occurs in lowest portions of Floresville City Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight before cresting at 35.7 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Floresville 27.0 5.4 Sat 8 am CDT 30.4 35.7 33.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM CDT.
